entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 04:00 AM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
